explains: v. 压倒；击败；控制；专横对待（overbear 的现在分词）
adj. 专横的，傲慢的；压倒一切的

sentences.en: My husband can be a little overbearing with our son.
sentences.cn: 我丈夫可能对我们的儿子专横一点。

sentences.en: She returns to the big screen to play Candy's overbearing mother, Rose.
sentences.cn: 她重返大银幕去扮演坎迪专横的母亲罗丝。

sentences.en: He's so overbearing that no one wants to work for him.
sentences.cn: 他那么专横，没人愿为他工作。
